name: grond
description:
Are you strong enough to walk the path to the other human?
There's 1 path between Red and Blue and if you don't hurry, strong AI armies will get in your way.
Named after a certain fight in one WoG map (Gauntlet of the Grond in Swords of Night and Day by Jim Vogan), which was probably named after Morgoth's hammer from Tolkien's Silmarillion.
Size L,
2 humans,
6 AIs,
Average Road,
average timer and sim turns,
160%,
standard trades for town and color,
leave AIs' towns as random,
1x111 res,
tech res if passage to one of the AIs generates as a guarded portal on the road, you can't beat that guard without big losses and can't go around it
Suggested mods: HotA to get non-grass native terrain for Conflux and at least one mod with a new town.
